item.title: Teleporting From items HELP!
item.dc:creator: @mjstar mjstar
item.description:
@mjstar wrote:

[quote=“dragonblood_dan, post:4, topic:113922”]case 131: // restore pot restorePot(); sendMessage("You drink the last dose of the restore potion and teleport"); teleportToX = 3210; teleportToY = 3424; deleteItem(131, GetItemSlot(131), 1); addItem(229, 1); break;
that should do it, please tell me if it works and by the way this will teleport you to varrock center[/quote]

will that work with the magic lyre because the magic lyre doesnt have the option restorepot()??? it has something different

Read full topic

that should do it, please tell me if it works and by the way this will teleport you to varrock center

item.title: Teleporting From items HELP!
item.dc:creator: @mjstar mjstar
item.description:
@mjstar wrote:

I am wanting to know how to use an item to teleport i found a code that will add xp from using it case 131: // restore pot restorePot(); sendMessage("You drink the last dose of the restore potion"); deleteItem(131, GetItemSlot(131), 1); addItem(229, 1); break;
but am not sure how to edit that
i want the command to teleport me to somewhere where when i play it the item code is 3690 and is a enchanted lyre it already has the play command i just need help to teleport me!! Please write code and i will put in credits 1% ure name!!! The main thing i am unsure of is changing the restorepot() Please Post if you can do the job before you start coding!!!

Read full topic
